Description:
Detects the abuse of the exefile handler in new file association. Used for bypass of security products.

Author: Andreas Hunkeler (@Karneades)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: New File Association Using Exefile
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where target_object like '%classes\.%' and details = 'exefile'
